name: What the Duct
description:
In "What the Duct" you attempt to fix broken objects with an unholy amount of duct tape.

The game was made for the global game jam 2020 with the theme "repair". Use your mouse to assemble the object, grab the tape and start taping.

Credits:

Leonard (@leonardschoelch) — Art, Programming

Laura (@laurabdev) — Art, Programming

Nils (@nilsgawlik) — Programming, Sound/Music

"ding" sound effect: "Bike, Bell Ding, Single, 01-01.wav" by InspectorJ (www.jshaw.co.uk) of Freesound.org
